parameters.name: Category
parameters.description:
The type of the snapshot. Valid values:

*   Standard: normal snapshot.
*   Flash: local snapshot.

Default value: Standard.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the [ISO 8601](~~25696~~) standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC. If the value of seconds (ss) is not 00, the time is rounded up to the next minute.

parameters.name: Period
parameters.description:
The interval at which to query the monitoring data of snapshot sizes. Unit: seconds. Valid values:

*   60
*   600
*   3600

Default value: 60.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the [ISO 8601](~~25696~~) standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC. If the value of seconds (ss) is not 00, the time is rounded up to the next minute.
